# clearStencil

**Instance Property**

The value to use when clearing the stencil attachment.

## Declaration

```swift
var clearStencil: UInt32 { get set }
```

## Discussion

If the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLRenderPassAttachmentDescriptor/loadAction] property of the attachment is set to [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLLoadAction/clear], then at the start of a render pass, the GPU fills the contents of the attachment with the value stored in the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLRenderPassStencilAttachmentDescriptor/clearStencil] property. Otherwise, the GPU ignores [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLRenderPassStencilAttachmentDescriptor/clearStencil].

The default value is `0`.
